===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# A blackish-green honey pill used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] "to release stagnated ''lung-[[qi]]'', dissipate phlegm, relieve cough in the treatment of Pertussis accompanied by fits of coughing, copious sputum, ''short breathing'', and a dry and hoarse throat".
